ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: The Ellipsoid 3D chart demo shows how to create high-performance 3D Ellipsoid Mesh with two-dimensional offset array applied to its surface using the SciChart 3D Component.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Ellipsoid 3D chart demo shows how to use [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.EllipsoidDataSeries3D%601.html']EllipsoidDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D.html']FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D[/url] to render 3d ellipsoid.
[url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D.html']FreeSurfaceRenderableSeries3D[/url] allows you to create all kinds of shapes, including Sphere, Cylinder, Disc and free-form mesh shapes, and overlay heightmap, colormap (palette) and contours. Find examples of other shapes in the same section here or visit [url='http://www.scichart.com']the web site[/url] for more information.
Palette Mode drop-down menu demonstrates different modes of the data representation.
